author: The Editorial Board
title: Moscow’s ‘Political’ Pipeline
text:
These are turbulent times for Europe’s relationship with Russia, and one consequence seems to be a welcome recognition in Berlin of the strategic importance of gas. Chancellor Angela Merkel this week admitted that a new Russian pipeline through the Baltic Sea is “political.” Now let’s see what she does about it.
The statement, in a press conference with Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko, was the first time Mrs. Merkel has said what everyone already knows about the Nord Stream 2 pipeline project. Stretching under the Baltic...
